document_data.History: The sage [[Beldrune]] claimed to have played the Second Undergardener in that play, once, in [[Ambara]], before the {{yearlink|761}} while he was working in [[Moonshorn Tower]]. At that time, his fellow [[Tabarast]] was reading that play.
